name: Endless SpacePort
description:
This game is a 2DIsometric roguelike made with Unity !

This was made for Kid Yeti : https://yeti-kid.itch.io/  for Secret Santa Jam !

How To Play :

  • w a s d  : Player Movement
  • Mouse :  Aim
  • Left Clic : Fire 

Crédit :

https://soundcloud.com/eric-skiff/underclocked-underunderclocked

http://timbeek.com/royalty-free-music/jingle-bells-8bit/

Alternative Description : "A strange game in which a man throws his excrement at innocent people"
